about.title: About the School
about.description: Sekolah Kebangsaan Bebuloh is a primary school in Labuan dedicated to nurturing excellence through holistic education and values-driven learning.

principal.name: Mr. Maidan Dali @ Sumardi Bin Yusoff
principal.message: As part of SK Bebuloh, we uphold unity and excellence in shaping young minds for a brighter future.

vision.title: Vision
vision.text: To cultivate excellence in education through unity and values.

mission.title: Mission
mission.text: To nurture knowledgeable and ethical students through quality teaching.
